landing.title: Hel Qofka Kugu Habboon
landing.subtitle: Ku xidh dad cajiib ah Afrika oo dhan
landing.readyToExperience: Diyaar u tahay Xiriir Gaar ah?
landing.embraceCulture: Qaado dhaqanka, fanka iyo ruuxa‚Äîhel qof run ahaantii ku fahma.

features.liveStreamingDesc: Daaw oo la xiriir dad waqti dhabta ah
features.videoChatDesc: Yeelo wadahadallo fool ka fool degdeg ah
features.eventsDesc: Ku biir dhacdooyinka maxalliga ah oo la kulam dad cusub
features.triviaDesc: Ku ciyaar dadka kale oo ku guulayso abaalmarino xiiso leh

sections.globalNetworksDesc: La xiriir dad ka yimid meelaha kala duwan ee adduunka.
sections.virtualDatesDesc: Sahamin siyaabo cusub oo isku xirnaanta, sida wadajir cuntada karinta iyada oo wacitaan fiidiyow.
sections.sharedEventsDesc: Ka qayb qaado dhacdooyinka dhaqameed ee gaarka ah onlayn iyo shakhsi ahaan.
sections.curatedPlaylistsDesc: Toddobaad kasta, ku raaxayso liisaska muusikada ee loogu talagalay noocyada dhaqameed ee kala duwan.
sections.intellectualDialogueDesc: Ka qayb qaado wadahadalada muhiimka ah ee ku saabsan falsafada, suugaanta ama sinimada.
sections.culturalQuizDesc: Hel khibradaha dhaqameed ee naftiidu ay ku raacsan tahay.
sections.personalizedMatchDesc: Iyada oo la adeegsanayo doorashooyinkaaga dhaqameed, waxaan kula xidhiidhinaa kuwa kale ee wadaaga nolol maalmeedka oo kale ah.
sections.shareConnectDesc: Ka qayb qaado wadahadalada soo jiidanaya, wadaag shaqooyinka abuurka ah.
sections.testimonial1: Waxaan la kulmay qof wadaaga jacaylkayga quruxda dhaqameed ee Hindiya.
sections.testimonial2: Waxaan isku xidhay aqoontayda wadaagga ah ee fanka Zulu.
sections.testimonial3: Waxaan raadinayay lammaane qaddarin kara hidda iyo dhaqankaygee.
sections.culturalQuizzesDesc: Nooca muusikada dhaqameed ee ah heesaha naftaada?
sections.digitalJourneyDesc: Ka qayb qaado safarro dhaqameed oo farsamaysan.
sections.culturalSignDesc: Sahmaan xiriiryo ku salaysan hiddaada dhaqameed.

common.termsFooter: Markaad gasho, waxaad aqbashay tilmaamahayaga bulshada.

step1.title: Shuruudaha Adeegga
step1.description: Fadlan dib u eeg oo aqbal shuruudaheena
step1.welcome: Ku soo dhawoow √íloo! Markaad adeegsato adeegayaga, waxaad aqbalaysaa shuruudaha adeegga iyo siyaasadda qarsoonnimada.
step1.agreeTerms: Waxaan aqbalayaa Shuruudaha Adeegga iyo Siyaasadda Qarsoonnimada

step2.title: Noo sheeg naftaada
step2.usernameHint: Magaca isticmaalaha ayaa ka soo muuqan doona profileka
step2.dateOfBirthHint: Da'daada ayaa dad badan arkayaan, laakiin maaha taariikhda dhalashadaada

step3.title: Macluumaadka Aasaasiga ah
step3.description: Faahfaahin dheeraad ah oo ku saabsan adiga

step4.title: Doorashooyinkaaga
step4.hobbiesPlaceholder: Noo sheeg madadaaladaada, xiisahooyinkaaga iyo habkaaga nolosha...

step5.title: Ku dar Sawirro
step5.description: Tus quruxdaada! Ku dar ugu yaraan hal sawir
step5.dragDrop: Jiid oo dhig ama guji si aad u soo geliso (ugu badnaan 6 sawir)
step5.tip: üí° **Talo:** Sawirkaaga koowaad ayaa noqon doona sawikaaga ugu weyn ee profileka. Ku dar dhinacyo badan iyo ilko cadayn run ah!

step6.title: Diyaar Baad Tahay!
step6.description: Ku soo dhawoow √íloo - aan helno qofkaaga ugu habboon
step6.ready: Diyaar u tahay inaad bilowdo safar kaaga?
step6.readyDescription: Profilekaagu waa dhammaystirmay oo waxaad diyaar u tahay inaad hesho dad cajiib ah oo wadaaga dhaqankaaga iyo qiyamkaaga.

errors.completeFields: Fadlan buuxi dhammaan meelaha loo baahan yahay

errors.mustBeLoggedIn: Waa inaad gasho si aad u dhammaystirto diiwaangelinta

auth.verificationStep1: Guji xiriirka iimaylka si aad u xaqiijiso akoonkaaga
auth.verificationStep2: Xaqiijinta ka dib, waxaa laguu jihayn doonaa si aad u dhammaystirto profilekaaga
auth.verificationStep3: Hubi galka spam-kaaga haddii aadan arkin iimaylka
auth.biometricConsent: Waxaan oggolaaday xaqiijinta wajiga si loogu daro ammaan iyo run profileka
auth.meaningfulConnections: La kulan xiriiryo macne leh oo ku salaysan dhaqanka iyo hiddaha
auth.continueJourney: Sii wad safar kaaga xiriirrada macnaha leh

discover.title: Baadh
discover.noMoreProfiles: Wax profile ah oo dheeraad ah ma jiraan
discover.checkBackLater: Mar kale soo noqo kulamada cusub

discover.foundMorePeople: Waxaan helay {{count}} qof oo kale oo la kulmaan.
discover.noMoreProfilesAvailable: Wax profile ah oo dheeraad ah ma jiraan
discover.seenAllProfiles: Waxaad aragtay dhammaan profileyada hadda la heli karo. Mar kale soo noqo!
discover.errorLoadingProfiles: Way ku guul darreysatay in la soo geliyo profile kale. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
discover.signInToLike: Fadlan gal si aad u jeclaato profileyada.
discover.signInToSuperLike: Fadlan gal si aad u isticmaasho Super Like.
discover.signInToContinue: Fadlan gal si aad u sii wadato.
discover.signInToAddFriends: Fadlan gal si aad u kudarato saaxiibbo.
discover.demoProfileInteractions: Is-dhexgalka waa la joojiyay profileyada tijaabada.
discover.demoProfileLikes: Jeclaanshaha waa la joojiyay profileyada tijaabada.
discover.demoProfileFriends: Waxaad ku dari kartaa isticmaalayaal run ah oo keliya saaxiibbo ahaan.
discover.demoProfileMessaging: Fariimaha waxaa la heli karaa isticmaalayaal run ah oo keliya.
discover.theyLikeBack: Waxaad jeclaatay {{name}}. Haddii ay ku jeclaadaan, way is waafaqaysaa!
discover.errorSuperLike: Way ku guul darreysatay in la diro Super Like. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
discover.errorLike: Way ku guul darreysatay in la diiwaan geliyo jeclaanshaha. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
discover.boostDesc: Sifeyntan ayaa kordhin doonta muuqaalka profilekaaga.
discover.youAndFriends: Adiga iyo {{name}} hadda saaxiibbo ayaad tihiin!
discover.messageSentSuccess: Fariintaada si guul leh ayaa loo diray.

authVerify.title: Fadlan xaqiiji iimaylkaaga si aad u sii wadato
authVerify.instructions: Guji xiriirka xaqiijinta ee iimaylka aan kuu soo dirnay. Marka la xaqiijiyo, si toos ah ayaa laguu jihayn doonaa.
authVerify.signOutDifferent: Ka bax oo isku day Iimaylka kale
authVerify.spamNote: Iimaylka ma heshay? Hubi galka spam-kaaga ama codso mid cusub.
authVerify.checkEmailClick: Fadlan hubi iimaylkaaga oo guji xiriirka xaqiijinta.
authVerify.errorStatus: Ma suurtoobaan in la hubiyo xaalada xaqiijinta
authVerify.newLinkSent: Xiriir xaqiijin cusub ayaa loo diray iimaylkaaga.

resetPassword.title: Dib u deji furaha sirtaada
resetPassword.description: Geli iimaylkaaga oo waxaan kuu soo diri doonaa xiriir dib u dejinta
resetPassword.waitSeconds: Fadlan sug {{seconds}} ilbiriqsi ka hor intaadan codsan xiriir dib u dejinta kale
resetPassword.checkEmail: Hubi iimaylkaaga! Waxaan kuu soo dirnay xiriir dib u dejinta furaha sirta. Fadlan hubi sanduuqaaga soo galka iyo galka spam.
resetPassword.securityNote: Sababaha amniga dartood, ma soo bandhigno in iimaylku ku jiro nidaamkayaga. Haddii aadan helin iimaylka, fadlan hubi galka spam-kaaga.

feed.title: Quudinta Bulshada
feed.subtitle: La soco saaxiibadaada oo hel waxa dhacaya
feed.quickBrowse: Sahamin degdeg ah oo kasbo lacag!
feed.browseShop: Sahamin hadiyadaha iyo alaabaha heer sare
feed.startConnecting: Bilow isku xirnaanta saaxiibbo si aad u aragto dhaqdhaqaaqa halkan!
feed.errorPosting: Ku guul darreysatay in la soo dhigo xaalada. Fadlan isku day mar kale.

index.premiumExperience: Khibrad jacayl heer sare ah xiriirrada casriga ah

about.title: Ku Saabsan √íloo
about.description: √íloo waa madal jacayl oo heer sare ah oo loogu talagalay in lagu dabaal dego dhaqanka Afrikaanka iyadoo la dhiiri gelinayo xiriirrada macnaha leh ee diaspora-da oo dhan.
about.missionText: Waxaan rumaysan nahay in la wada keeno dadka iyada oo loo marayo qiyamka la wadaago, qaddarinta dhaqanka, iyo xiriirrada dhabta ah.
about.culturalCelebration: Dabaal degista dhaqanka wadnaha xiriir kasta
about.advancedVerification: Nidaamyada xaqiijinta horumarsan ee amniga iyo daacadnimada
about.premiumFeatures: Sifooyinka heer sare ee loogu talagalay xiriirrada macnaha leh
about.communityFocused: Madal diiradda saaraya bulshada oo leh xiriirrada tooska ah
about.contactText: Su'aalo ama ra'yi ma leedahay? Waxaan jeclaan lahayn inaan kaa maqalno

shopPage.title: Dukaanka Farsamada
shopPage.subtitle: Ku bixin lacagtaada alaabaha gaarka ah si aad u habayso profilekaaga
shopPage.unlockExclusive: Fur alaabaha VIP ee gaarka ah oo ay ku jiraan astaamaha qoraal-sheegidda, mawduucyada heer sare, iyo habaynta gaarka ah
shopPage.seasonalDesc: Alaabaha waqtiga xaddidan waxaa la heli karaa oo keliya dhacdooyinka gaarka ah iyo maalmaha ciidda
shopPage.noSeasonalDesc: Hadda alaabo xilli ah lama heli karo. Mar kale soo noqo maalmaha ciidda iyo dhacdooyinka gaarka ah alaabaha gaarka ah ee waqtiga xaddidan!
shopPage.noVipItems: Hadda alaabo VIP ah lama heli karo
